pedigree.generation3: Sharpen Up,Trephine,Big Spruce,Inca Queen,Sadler's Well,Sound of Success,Creative Plan,Bali

row.cell: Winner of only Point-to-Point, at Ballysteen, when trained by Andrew Slattery. Bought by Susan Ricci and sent to Willie Mullins. Considered a good prospect for the Champion Bumper, but missed the race due to injury and wasn't ready to race until May.
Punchestown win, over two miles on good going, indicated that not the dour stayer, that an earlier win over three miles in heavy ground might suggest.
Down to 9/4 Fav for the Champion Hurdle.
The legend of "Faugheen, the machine!" is born. Now 5/4 Fav for the Champion Hurdle.
